name: European Association of Machine Tool Merchants
goal: The European Association of Machine Tool Merchants is a non-profit organisation and its objectives are the realisation and co-ordination of research into the European and international legislation and technical regulations with regard to everything that is connected with machine tools. In this respect the association is allowed to assure and distribute scientific publications, organise congresses, set up its websites (development, maintenance and promotion) and can undertake all activities, which can stimulate this purpose.
interests: Business and Industry, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
Machinery Directive
European Commission
Directorate-General for Growth
Unit C3 – Advanced Engineering and Manufacturing Systems
